title: VulnLLM-R: Specialized Reasoning LLM with Agent Scaffold for Vulnerability Detection
summary: We propose VulnLLM-R, the~\emph{first specialized reasoning LLM} for vulnerability detection. Our key insight is that LLMs can reason about program states and analyze the potential vulnerabilities, rather than simple pattern matching. This can improve the model's generalizability and prevent learning shortcuts.
